sentences.sentence: She was advised to create some dolls with curlier hair, so she did.
sentences.translation: 有人建议她制作一些头发比较卷的娃娃，她采纳了。

sentences.sentence: Finn, his dirty blond curls curlier than ever after the beach, asked if we were going to see any animals, so I told him there would be elephant seals.
sentences.translation: 芬恩在海滩上玩过后，脏兮兮的淡金色卷发比以往卷曲得更加厉害，他问我们会不会看到任何动物，于是我告诉他说，我们会看到象海豹。

sentences.sentence: The dolls reflect varying skin tones – light brown, chocolate, and caramel – and Trichelle and Kianna have curlier hair.
sentences.translation: 这些娃娃呈现出不同的肤色—浅棕色、巧克力色和褐色，而特里切尔和琪亚娜还留着比较卷的头发。
